title: Reviving the head tax & restricting campaign financing on Council Edition
description: How will a new law about campaign financing impact City Council races? Is the Council ready to reconsider an employee head tax for homelessness funding? Plus, how would a plan to protect and enhance the city's tree canopy affect your neighborhood? Councilmembers Lisa Herbold, Alex Pedersen, and Dan Strauss answer these questions and the ones you're sending in, too, here on Council Edition!
